dict.string:
# Search the current document for \label{â€¦} declarations and # show these in a list, from which the user can pick. # Also search in files \include'd in the file pointed to # by the TM_LATEX_MASTER variable.
var=`echo $TM_CURRENT_WORD|grep -v '}'` list=`ruby -- "$TM_BUNDLE_PATH/Support/bin/labelList.rb"` #list=`grep "\\label{$var.*}"|perl -pe 's/.*\\label\{(.*?)\}(.*)\n/"$1 : $2",/'|sed 's|\\\\||g'` res=`osascript <<EOF tell application "System Events" activate choose from list { ${list:0:${#list}-1} } end tell EOF` osascript -e 'tell app "TextMate" to activate' &>/dev/null & res2=`sed <<<$res 's/^.* : \(.*\)$/\1/'` echo -n ${res2#${var}}
